author: tng
msg: Performance: it seems we can use *srcPtr directly instead of assigning it to firstByte first.   This is to reduce some instruction counts.

author: tng
msg: Performance: do not call XMLString::stringLen if just for the purpose of checking zero-length string.

author: tng
msg: Namespace Validity:  if namespace is on and validation is on, attribute values declared to be of types ID, IDREF(S), ENTITY(IES), and NOTATION are also Names, and thus should be colon-free.

msg: Schema Errat E2-24 Duration 'T': allow to catch SchemaDateTimeException
